verse:
यदात्मतत्त्वेन तु ब्रह्मतत्त्वं दीपोपमेनेह युक्तः प्रपश्येत्‌।
अजं ध्रुवं सर्वतत्त्वैर्विशुद्धं ज्ञात्वा देवं मुच्यते सर्वपाशैः॥

terms.ब्रह्मतत्त्वं: the knowledge of Brahman (the Ultimate Reality)

meaning: Meaning:When one realizes the truth of the self, like a lamp is lit, and sees the knowledge of Brahman, they understand that the Divine is unborn and unchanging, pure through all beings. By knowing this, they become liberated from all bondage.
